Philip II the Younger (MARCVS IVLIVS SEVERVS PHILIPPVS)
Decius (Trajan II Decius) (CAIVS MESSIVS QVINTVS TRAIANVS DECIVS)
Herennius Etruscus (QVINTVS HERENNIVS ETRVSCVS MESSIVS DECIVS)
Trebonianus Gallus (CAIVS VIBIVS AFINIVS TREBONIANVS GALLVS)
Claudius II Gothicus (MARCVS AVRELIVS VALERIVS CLAVDIVS)
Constantius I Chlorus (MARCVS FLAVIVS VALERIVS CONSTANTIVS HERCVLIVS)
Maximinus II Daia (CAIVS CALERIVS VALERIVS MAXIMINVS)
Constantine I the Great (FLAVIVS VALERIVS AVRELIVS CONSTANTINVS)
Theodosius II the Calligrapher (FLAVIVS THEODOSIVS IVNIOR)
